message:
I've applied a patch to cleanly replace the body of `get_rep_directions_agent` with a properly indented PCA implementation that centers hidden states, computes per-layer means, and returns the first principal component per layer. Please run the test now:

```
python3 /workspace/benchmark/datasets/6-RepE/representation-engineering-main/unit_test/unit_test_1.py
```
